entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
